h2_title: Wandering Wight Boss Fight and Guide
content: If you do try to fight him early, we at least recommend making a quick detour left of the Wandering Wight to fight a much more manageable optional Yaoguai Chief — Guangzhi — as he drops a Transformation Spell that can be instrumental in surviving this fight.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Wandering_Wight.md', within the main section titled 'Wandering Wight', specifically from the subsection 'Wandering Wight Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
If you do try to fight him early, we at least recommend making a quick detour left of the Wandering Wight to fight a much more manageable optional Yaoguai Chief — Guangzhi — as he drops a Transformation Spell that can be instrumental in surviving this fight.
